messages.content: As an AI assistant, my role is to meticulously analyze criminal justice documents and extract information about law enforcement personnel. The response will contain: 1) The name of a law enforcement personnel. The individual's name must be prefixed with one of the following titles to be in law enforcement: Detective, Sergeant, Lieutenant, Captain, Deputy, Officer, Patrol Officer, Criminalist, Technician, Coroner, or Dr. Please prefix the name with 'Officer Name: '. I will derive this data from the following paragraph: On Sept 5, DET. Z. X. Black was told about a weird fire at Pinebrook Apartments. Someone told? - Mr. Parker (resident) and Ms. Morris (building person). SEND TO: DETECTIVE DIVISION. INFORMANT PAPERS. Lt. Y. W. Holt - things to DO. Det. Black, Sr. .. looking INTO. Detective A. B. Reed and Detective C. D. Wright - they went to the scene. ELMER 08:15 Fire? Mr. Parker said gasoline smell? Ms. Morris showed building camera videos. Technician Iris? Took some fire things. AND THEN: DETECTIVE DIVISION 3- update maybe? Det. Black Sr, Det. Reed, Det. Wright WHAT THEY DO? Lt. Holt INFORMANT - Morris, Elaine from Vermont. ELMER again 08:15 Fire. Morning, Detectives Black, Reed, Wright and Lieutenant Holt - found someone suspicious in the video. Captain E. F. Gomez sent alerts. Sergeant G. H. Nelson and Sergeant I. J. Quinn talked to people. By lunch? They caught someone. SEND TO DETECTIVE people - STATUS [CHECK ONE] Det. Black Sr, Det. Reed, Det. Wright DOING THINGS Lt. Holt PAPER - Fire Report (lots of things in it). SOME OTHER DETAILS. And then a name? CHIEF DEPUTY IN CHARGE K. Lewis P.P.D. DETECTIVE: Z. BLACK FOR: DETECTIVE DIVISION more things.
Identify each individual in the transcript, by name, who are directly referred to as officers, sergeants, lieutenants, captains, detectives, homicide officers, and crime lab personnel.

Officer Name: DET. Z. X. Black  Officer Context: On Sept 5, DET. Z. X. Black was told about a weird fire at Pinebrook Apartments. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Lt. Y. W. Holt  Officer Context: Lt. Y. W. Holt - things to DO. Officer Role: Lieutenant Officer Name: Detective A. B. Reed  Officer Context: Detective A. B. Reed and Detective C. D. Wright - they went to the scene. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Detective C. D. Wright  Officer Context: Detective A. B. Reed and Detective C. D. Wright - they went to the scene. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Technician Iris  Officer Context: Technician Iris? Took some fire things. Officer Role: Technician Officer Name: Detective Black  Officer Context: Morning, Detectives Black, Reed, Wright and Lieutenant Holt - found someone suspicious in the video. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Detective Reed  Officer Context: Morning, Detectives Black, Reed, Wright and Lieutenant Holt - found someone suspicious in the video. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Detective Wright  Officer Context: Morning, Detectives Black, Reed, Wright and Lieutenant Holt - found someone suspicious in the video. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Captain E. F. Gomez  Officer Context: Captain E. F. Gomez sent alerts. Officer Role: Captain Officer Name: Sergeant G. H. Nelson  Officer Context: Sergeant G. H. Nelson and Sergeant I. J. Quinn talked to people. Officer Role: Sergeant Officer Name: Sergeant I. J. Quinn Officer Context: Sergeant G. H. Nelson and Sergeant I. J. Quinn talked to people. Officer Role: Sergeant
